hero.subtitle: AI-POWERED NUTRITION GUIDE
hero.title: Make Healthy Choices Simple
hero.description: Get personalized nutrition recommendations powered by AI. Scan food labels, track your diet, and make informed decisions about your health journey.

scan.description: Take control of your nutrition with our AI-powered food scanner. We analyze ingredients instantly, providing clear insights about additives, nutritional value, and health impact. Make informed choices for a healthier lifestyle with every scan.

about.subtitle: About Us
about.title: Empowering Your Health Journey
about.description: Our mission is to revolutionize how you understand and choose your food. Through advanced AI analysis and personalized recommendations, we help you make informed decisions about your nutrition and overall well-being.

superBowl.title: Super Food Bowl
superBowl.description: A nutrient-rich bowl packed with fresh vegetables, quinoa, avocado, and a variety of superfoods. Perfect for maintaining a balanced and healthy diet.

mediterranean.title: Mediterranean Delight
mediterranean.description: Experience the flavors of the Mediterranean with this healthy mix of vegetables, olive oil, and whole grains. Rich in antioxidants and heart-healthy fats.

proteinBowl.title: Protein Power Bowl
proteinBowl.description: A perfect post-workout meal loaded with lean proteins, complex carbohydrates, and essential nutrients for muscle recovery and growth.

aiAnalysis.title: AI Food Analysis
aiAnalysis.description: Get instant AI-powered analysis of food products with detailed nutritional information.

smartRecommendations.title: Smart Recommendations
smartRecommendations.description: Receive personalized healthy alternatives based on your dietary preferences.

ingredientAnalysis.title: Ingredient Analysis
ingredientAnalysis.description: Understand the impact of ingredients on your health with clear explanations.

healthTracking.title: Health Tracking
healthTracking.description: Monitor your food choices and track progress towards your health goals.

welcome.title: Welcome to WellEat
welcome.subtitle: Your journey to healthier eating starts here
welcome.joinCommunity: Join our community of health-conscious food lovers

personalizedDiet.title: Personalized Diet
personalizedDiet.description: Customized recommendations based on your preferences

healthTracking.title: Health Tracking
healthTracking.description: Monitor your nutrition goals and progress

allergies.title: Any Allergies?
allergies.question: Do you have any food allergies?
